nhc_headline: ...SYSTEM BECOMES A TROPICAL DEPRESSION... ...HURRICANE WATCH ISSUED FOR PORTIONS OF CUBA...
summary:
...SYSTEM BECOMES A TROPICAL DEPRESSION... ...HURRICANE WATCH ISSUED FOR PORTIONS OF CUBA...
 As of 10:00 AM EST Mon Nov 4
 the center of Eighteen was located near 15.2, -76.9
 with movement N at 9 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.
